ARABIC: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَٰثًا وَهُمْ شَٰهِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or did We create the angels female, with them as witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or did We make the angels females, and they witnessed it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did We create the angels as females the while they witnessed?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have We created the angels as females before their very eyes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or that have We created the angels as females, while they were present?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or did We create the angels female while they were witnesses
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or did We create the angels females while they were witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or did We create the angels females, while they were witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or created We the angels females while they were present?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Did We create the angels females, to which they were witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or created We the angels females while they were witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Did We create the angels females while they were present?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or that We created the angels female, and they are witnesses (thereto)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or did We create the angels females while they were witnesses?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, did We create the angels females while they were witnessing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or did We create the angels females, as they witnessed?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:150] Or did We create the angels females while they were witnesses?, to Our [act of] creation, that they might then say such a thing?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or created We the angels females) as you claim (while they were present?
